body: Could have used more dp, but its decent enough, kinda agree with the guys below tho.

This is pure shit. I mean, don't get me wrong. I love his Naruto doujins, his stiff style goes really well with Naruto. But Fate... it looks awful and a really missed oportunity. I hope this doesn't repeat in the future. And I know for a fact that the guys uses to lurk in websites where his art is published so I hope he read this. Dude. No. Just play no. You're drawing doujins since I have memory and your art hasn't progressed jack shit, in fact it actually seems worse from other old doujins! Refine your formula, not this crap.
Agreed with the guy below me
God he brought his shitty art onto fate this is unforgivable -♾/10
Sorry I don't see Raikou. All I see is Hinata.
